metadata.title: CVE-2021-23996 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: By utilizing 3D CSS in conjunction with Javascript, content could have beenrendered outside the webpage's viewport, resulting in a spoofing attackthat could have been used for phishing or other attacks on a user. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
